H0.text: Hamid Karzai became the first elected president of which country in 2004. Afghanistan

H1.text: Hamid Karzai became the first elected president of which country in 2004. Pakistan

H2.text: Hamid Karzai became the first elected president of which country in 2004. Iran

H3.text: Hamid Karzai became the first elected president of which country in 2004. IROA

A4.text: Karzai was sworn in as President of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan on 7 December 2004, at a formal ceremony in Kabul.

A5.text: he became the first democratically elected leader of Afghanistan.
